content: In 2021 which Puerto Rican rapper won a Grammy and released a new album while keeping his day job as a reggaeton superstar?

In 2021, Bad Bunny, the Puerto Rican rapper and singer, won a Grammy Award and released a new album while maintaining his status as a reggaeton superstar. He won the Grammy for Best Latin Pop or Urban Album for his album "YHLQMDLG" and released "El Último Tour del Mundo," which was highly anticipated and well-received by fans and critics alike.
